name: Bunnies are Out of Control
description:
The bunny population is out of control. Don't burn yourself.

WASD to move. Mouse to shoot.
Defeat the boss and see how many bunnies you can roast.

Made for GMTK 2020. The theme was "Out of Control"
Got confused with GMT and BST and missed the submission deadline by an hour.

Made with my friends Dan and Alex.
We all have programming experience but first game for all of us.
